snippet.title: Escape The Pacific - Long Distance
snippet.description:
This video demonstrates the capability of our engine in Lost In Pacific game to manage long distances. The distance traveled here was about 530 km (~330 miles). The amount of islands was ~350 and the number of Island Clusters was 35. 

In the final game the world size will be unlimited. Limitation will be only in story mode to ~2000 x 2000 km (1250 x 1250 miles).

For more information see: https://gamers4gamersteam.com/lost-in-pacific/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/G4GTeam
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Gamers4GamersTeam
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/lost-in-pacific

We will upload more videos soon.
